posts.text:
Einn að drulla uppá bak í Nurnburning eða hvað það heitir.....

Ohhhh I´m excited!!!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cuMTcrZpMFI

Og Top gear viljann <<<icon_smile.gif>>>

March 13, 2007 
Is this you?
Looks like we've started a bit of a cult. 

When we posted this viral clip of a BMW driver hashing up his first corner at the Nurburgring, it had a couple of hundred hits on YouTube. 

Watch clip 

Now it's up over 40,000 views. No surprise really - the world's worst 'Ring debut has already become a classic in the TG office. 

But now for phase two. We want to find the driver. Not in a scary way - we want to make you a star. So if you're Brandon (listen carefully to the clip) or you know him, drop us an email and we might just be able to sort out some track-day fun for you. 

Top Gear is not responsible for the content of external websites.
GMFG þetta er alveg ótrúlega misheppnað <<<icon_biggrin.gif>>> ég vil sjá hann í top gear.
